title: Curiosity Stream’s documentaries and more are a great stocking stuffer, now under $170
content:
Macworld

Within the past few months, major streaming hubs like Disney+, AppleTV, Paramount+, and even Netflix announced price increases for their video services. Instead of feeding into the streaming wars arms race, you can land a well-stocked entertainment and educational streaming platform library at a fantastic price – for life.

Curiosity Stream offers documentaries, TV shows, and other original programming that explores human history and our understanding of it. Now, you can grab it for yourself or gift it to a streaming-obsessed loved one this holiday season for only $169.97 reg. $399) through October 31st!

The brainchild of John Hendricks, who founded cable mainstays like the Discovery Channel and TLC, Curiosity Stream (4.7 stars on the App Store!) serves up content on everything from nature and science to history and technology. Subscribers can watch on all their favorite streaming devices in full HD (1920×1080).

Curiosity Stream even lets users craft their own viewing experiences, providing easy search tools to find their favorite areas of interest. Streamers can even bookmark shows or documentaries and resume viewing their current favorites on another device. And with regular content updates, users won’t run out of things to watch.

Curiosity Stream’s content is so highly rated and unique that it even won its first Emmy award for Outstanding Graphic Design & Art Direction for Stephen Hawking’s Favorite Places!

This holiday season, give the gift of original and affordable streaming.

Grab a lifetime subscription to Curiosity Stream’s Standard Plan, now just $169.97. No coupon is needed, but this exclusive offer ends October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!
